definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
full of youthful energy (idiom); vigorous/energetic/a bright spark

sentences.english: Perfection Lighting Co. , Ltd. is a vigorous and innovative enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 中山完美燈飾廠是一個充滿朝氣和創新的企業。

sentences.english: This is such a young and vibrant, quick team.
sentences.chinese: 這是一支年青，有朝氣，速度迅速的球隊。

sentences.english: This is a young and intercross subject, full of youthful spirit and expectation .
sentences.chinese: 這是一門年輕的充滿朝氣與希望的交叉學科。

sentences.english: She is full of vigour and enthusiasm.
On every front there are young people abounding in vigor and vitality.
sentences.chinese: 在各條戰線上都有精力充沛朝氣蓬勃的青年人。

sentences.english: It's an up-and-coming city and hopefully people go visit.
sentences.chinese: 那是一座有朝氣的城市，希望人們能去參觀。

sentences.english: Young Singaporeans seem to lack the astuteness and dynamism that they possess.
sentences.chinese: 本地的一般年輕人似乎就缺少了那份機靈和朝氣。

sentences.english: It can dfeelage me up when people don't do their job right.
sentences.chinese: 有人沒把份內的事做好就令我朝氣。

sentences.english: Run out and get several copies of this high-spirited school story.
sentences.chinese: 看完並仿效幾次這個朝氣蓬勃的校園故事吧。
第二，技術仍然朝氣蓬勃。

sentences.english: We have 87 qualified and hard-working teaching staff.
sentences.chinese: 學院師資隊伍朝氣蓬勃，現有專兼職教師87人。

sentences.english: A running teenage rolling an iron hoop, symbolizes the vigorous Zhangjiang.
sentences.chinese: 一個滾動鐵圈的奔跑少年，象徵着朝氣蓬勃的張江。

sentences.english: Happy SURPRISES gladden the heart and enliven us.
sentences.chinese: 快樂的驚喜令人心快樂且有朝氣。

sentences.english: He quarreled; his voice tremjewelry with fury.
sentences.chinese: 他爭論着，他的聲響由於朝氣而戰慄。

sentences.english: Teachers vibrant, innovative spirit in firepower, Zonta dedication.
sentences.chinese: 師資隊伍充滿朝氣，有火力有創新精神，崇德敬業。

sentences.english: Rooters are all beautiful girls full of vigour and vitality.
sentences.chinese: 拉拉隊裏面都是漂亮的小姑娘，個個都朝氣蓬勃的。

definition: full of youthful energy (idiom); vigorous/energetic/a bright spark
spirit trembling with excitement (idiom); in high spirits/lively and full of enthusiasm/full of energy/con brio
opportunity to live/to reprieve from death/life force/vitality
sense of movement (often in a static work of art)/dynamic/vivid/lifelike
variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
brimming with enthusiasm (idiom); full of warmth
